snippet: Irving Azoff has asked YouTube to remove from its music plan thousands of songs by the Eagles, John Lennon and other songwriters associated with Mr. Azoff’s new music publishing venture.
lead_paragraph: Irving Azoff has asked YouTube to remove from its music plan thousands of songs by the Eagles, John Lennon and other songwriters associated with Mr. Azoff’s new music publishing venture.

headline.main: New YouTube Music Plan Faces Challenge
headline.print_headline: New YouTube Music Plan Faces Challenge
